name: the_boys
description:
Play as GB and GBA. Try to survive.

This Game was made in ~72 hours for Mini Jam 30

Controls 

Move -  A & D

Down - S

Jump - Space

Attack - Left Mouse Button

Swap Character - Q

Dash (as GB) - Right Mouse Button

Double Jump (as GBA) - Space or Right Mouse Button

 ???? - Click Cartridge Icon
